data.title: FELIX Bela Poz
data.meta_description: FELIX bela poz - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. This document provides an introduction and first chapter of the memoir "Lost Splendor" by Prince Felix Yussupov. It summarizes the history of Felix's Tartar ancestors, beginning with Aboubekir ben Raioc in the 6th century who was a descendant of the Prophet Ali. It describes Khan Yussuf in the 15th century who was a powerful ruler allied with Tsar Ivan the Terrible. It focuses on Yussuf's daughter Soumbeca, the famous Queen of Kazan, and her imprisonment by Ivan the Terrible after Kazan was captured. The chapter ends by describing how Yussuf's descendants took the name Yussupov and served the Tsars, gaining prominence
